articles.content: MUMBAI : Shares of RBL bank fell more than 22% on Monday after the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) approved the appointment of R. Subramaniakumar as its managing director (MD) and chief executive officer… [+2854 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: RBI much ahead in containing inflation: SBI report - Economic Times
articles.description: After rising to a 95-month (almost 8 years) high of 7.79 per cent in April, Consumer Price Index (CPI) based inflation moderated to 7.04 per cent in May. Core CPI also moderated in May to 6.09 per cent compared to 6.97 per cent in April, as per the SBI's rese…
articles.content: The Reserve Bank is much ahead of the curve in containing inflation, which appeared to have peaked, though it may go for an interest rate hike in August and October, said an research report on Monday… [+2070 chars]

articles.title: More than 44% India-based software developers may call it quits this year: Report - Moneycontrol
